objects.text:
Handcrafted designer comfort
with artistic folk-inspired patterns
for your everyday adventures.

• Unique folk-art design
• Premium leather construction
• Ergonomic cushioned sole
• Hand-stitched craftsmanship

product_details.name: Whimsical Woodland Adventure Sneakers - Handcrafted Designer Comfort
product_details.description:
• Unique folk-art inspired design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium cream and tan leather construction
• Ergonomic cushioned sole with bubble traction design
• Contrast rust-colored laces for stylish accent
• Artistic toe cap detailing with intricate stitching
• Soft interior lining for maximum comfort
• Breathable leather upper material
• Durable rubber outsole for long-lasting wear
• Perfect blend of artistic design and practical comfort
• Hand-stitched details showcasing superior craftsmanship
• Versatile style suitable for casual and bohemian fashion
• Available in unisex sizing for universal appeal

banner_details:
The banner is a modern, grid-themed advertisement for handcrafted sneakers. It uses a four-panel background split into diagonally opposing tones—light beige, warm sand, terracotta, and rich mocha—complemented by a soft grid and circular accents. The left half contains text elements, including a large bold heading ("heading"), an elegant subheading ("subheading"), and a brief introduction ("description") that promotes the artistic craftsmanship. Below that, the "features" section lists key selling points in bullet-style. On the right side, a detailed product image ("product_image") is presented above a bold price ("price") and a soft-toned rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") with the text ("cta"). The design emphasizes a handcrafted, artistic, and earthy aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Beige: `#F5F0E5`
- Sandstone: `#E5D9C8`
- Terracotta: `#C3957A`
- Mocha Brown: `#8A5A44`
- Dark Chocolate: `#6D4C3D`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features an earthy, warm-toned sneaker that blends shades of beige, tan, caramel, and burnt orange to create a handcrafted and organic aesthetic. The dominant base is a smooth beige (#F5D7B2) enriched with caramel brown (#D97A39) accents, particularly on the laces and heel detailing. A light cream (#EFE1C8) outlines the intricate patterns, while deeper burnt orange (#A34E1F) highlights the textured portions, enhancing depth and contrast. The sole includes a muted mocha brown (#9C6B46), grounding the palette. These warm hues create a cozy, artisanal vibe perfect for banners targeting a rustic, authentic, and visually tactile appeal.
